Open the "Contacts" application.
Click the three dots icon located at the top right corner of the screen.
Click on "Show archived conversations".
Click the settings icon to access the settings menu.
Click on "Manage blocked numbers" to access the blocked numbers settings.
Click the three-dot menu icon to reveal options for "Import blocked numbers" and "Export blocked numbers".
Click "Export blocked numbers" to export the blocked numbers.
Click "OK" to export the blocked numbers to a file named "Blocked numbers_2025_03_23_04_03_15".
